name: 你的女朋友
description:
Your girlfriend, big and white. This game, strong and powerful. Want to be happy? Just a few mouse clicks away.
Gameplay:
Main interface to choose good-looking girls, into the game. There are a lot of pieces in the game, and you have to drag them around with the mouse to make them look like the original pieces. That is, a simple jigsaw puzzle!
Double the fun! Let's have fun!
